actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Migratory Bird Treaty Act to permit the possession by taxidermists of certain migratory birds.

summary.text: Amends the Migratory Treaty Bird Act to permit the possession or mounting of migratory birds for display and educational purposes, if such birds are dead from natural or unknown causes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Migratory Bird Treaty Act to permit the possession by taxidermists of certain migratory birds.
